articles.title: Democratic Republic of the Congo deepens investigation on cluster of illness and community deaths in Equateur province - WHO | Regional Office for Africa
articles.description: Health authorities in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and experts from World Health Organization (WHO) are carrying out further investigations to determine the cause of another cluster of illness and community deaths in Equateur province.
